mapper.insert: insert into sale_board(sb_name, sb_price, sb_info, sb_date, sb_me_num, sb_sc_num) values(#{saleBoard.sb_name}, #{saleBoard.sb_price}, #{saleBoard.sb_info}, #{saleBoard.sb_date}, #{saleBoard.sb_me_num}, #{saleBoard.sb_sc_num})
mapper.select: select * from sale_board order by sb_date desc

select * from sale_board where 1 = 1
and (sb_num like concat('%', #{cri.search}, '%') or sb_name like concat('%', #{cri.search}, '%') or sb_info like concat('%', #{cri.search}, '%'))
and ${cri.type} like concat('%', #{cri.search}, '%')
order by sb_date desc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
select me_nick from member where me_num = #{sb_me_num}
select sc_name from sale_category where sc_num = #{sb_sc_num}
select me_sugar from member where me_num = #{sb_me_num}
